-- Архив с индексом SELECT DISTINCT a.cardID FROM ( SELECT c.card_id as cardID, av3.string_value FROM Card c -- все "хранения документа" left JOIN card c1 ON /*c1.card_id = av2.number_value and */c1.template_id = 1244 and c1.parent_card_id = c.card_id
left join attribute_value av on av.attribute_code = 'NAMESLIST_IDX' and av.card_id = c1.card_id
left join card c2 on c2.card_id = av.number_value and c2.template_id = 347 -- left JOIN attribute_value av3 ON (av3.card_id = c2.card_id AND av3.attribute_code in ('NAME'))
WHERE -- c.status_id in (104) and coalesce(av3.string_value, '') <> ''
) AS a
order by 1
